710701f-a.text:
587 to 581 Eleventh Ave., west side, at, adjoining and south of the S.W. corner of West 44th Street. Also show (right) is No. 600 West 44th Street, a 1-story building adjoining the S.W. corner of Eleventh Ave., and occupied by the Metropolitan Onyxs Marble Co.

F. L. Sperr.

710707f-a.text:
Eleventh Avenue, east side, south from West 45th Street. Most of this area has been cleared as a part of the track removal program of the New York Central R.R. Nos. 586-580, at, adjoining and south of the S.E. corner of 44th Street, are still standing. Shown across clearance, is West 44th Street, at, adjoining and east of the S.E.
corner of Eleventh Avenue.
View 2 shows the same area, at a later date. P. L. Sperr  View 1: Dec. 4, 1936 NO REPRODUCTIONS  View 2: Sept. 4, 1940
